data.title: The Giving Pledge
data.meta_description: Those who join the Giving Pledge often write a letter explaining their decision to make this public commitment, their reasons for engaging in philanthropy, and the causes that motivate them. We invite you to explore these letters.
data.text:
Pledge Signatories

Individuals and couples who join the Giving Pledge are encouraged to write a letter explaining their decision to make this public commitment, their reasons for engaging in philanthropy, and the causes that motivate them. We invite you to explore the letters below.
